I forgot to do one thing when creating the artifacts, that being 
describing them. So i'll do a quick description now, and a more 
detailed one later.

The artifacts are small crystaline square shaped pieces, which go 
together to form a larger crystaline sqaure. Under sensors, they 
give off varrying energon readings, but don't seem to affect any 
bots by putting them into energon stasis lock. One though could be 
to use the pieces for a power source, but their instability is a big 
problem. They don't have a particular colour, but tend to take on a 
darker colours around bots of evil intent, and lighter colours 
around bots of good intent. They are not actually Vok artifacts, 
rather, the 4 pieces make up the power core for a space cruiser used 
and developed by one of the Vok's enemies. At the moment, there is 
no known way to actually destroy one of the artifacts... then again, 
nobody has really tried have they. =p

Does that sound good for the moment?
